section.name: Examples
section.p: Examples for the tags are for several reasons not included in the java sources but maintained as external files.

To add examples for a tag, you would define a base dir for your examples, add subdirectories that reflect the package of the tag classes and place an xml-file with the exampled for each tag. The name of the example files is currently not configurable. It is always concatenated from the prefix 'example-', the name of the tag class and the extension '.xml'.

Adding a file with examples for the class 'foo.bar.CircleTag.java' would lead to the following structure
+ [basedir] + foo + bar example-CircleTag.xml
To tell the plugin where it should look for examples, you would pass the basedir with the property example.dir
